Articles.Content:
I've been a long time lurker on these forums, and with 1.0.x I've been checking many times per day, so time to sign up.

A bit about me: I've been playing KSP since ARM (0.23.5?) and have about 400 hours played since then. I'm currently working on my Ph.D. in physics and have always been fascinated by space, so it's really the perfect game for me. Not to mention the community. I didn't know such a helpful, intelligent community could exist on the internet until I came here. Looking forward to being a part of it.
Well, you already are a part of it! Welcome, Volix!

Good luck on your Ph.D.!

Thsi community is what happens when you have awesome moderators on the forums. Be sure to check out the Moderator Appreciation thread!

Welcome, you'll feel at home here.
